climbs.name: Yellowman
climbs.fa: Chris Miller and Pete Paredes, August 2002

content.description: Climbs the left side of a smooth face streaked with yellow lichen and features fun climbing up flared seams, rock ribs and the odd jug to anchors at the very top of the wall that offers a great view of the surroundings.
content.location: Far left side and the left of two bolted lines, with a lower start than it's neighbor.

climbs.name: White Rabbit
climbs.fa: Jeff Brennan, Will Carlson and Pat Brennan, June 2001

content.description: A short but pleasant hand sized crack that may most easily be reached by climbing the easy gully on the right margin of Rock Craft or when downclimbing the routes further to the left.
content.location:
Not actually on Rock Craft proper but up and right from the base of

Smelly Bush Crack

and above

Jump Start

.

climbs.name: Smelly Bush Crack
climbs.fa: Will Carlson, Jeff Brennan and Pat Brennan, June 2001

content.description:
Climbs a thin crack past a bush down low to shared finish with

Roll-On

up an right-slanting flake.
content.location:
This is the next crack right of

Roll-On

.

climbs.name: Roll-On
climbs.fa: Pat Brennan, Will Carlson, Jeff Brennan and Kenn Kenaga, August 2001

content.description:
Lieback a thin, left-facing flake past a bush and to it's end and merge into a shared finish with

Smelly Bush Crack

up an right-slanting flake.
content.location:
Just right of

Bread, Live in Concert

.

climbs.name: Reggae Calypso
climbs.fa: Chris Miller and Pete Paredes, August 2002

content.description: Engaging climbing up the lichen splashed wall using a variety of techniques as you lieback, jam, edge and smear your way to the anchors.
content.location:
Far left side of the face and just right of

Yellowman

, starting from the ledge.

content.description: A short face with thin edges that could conceivably be bouldered as well as top-roped.
content.location:
Located down and right from

Jump Start

.

climbs.name: Jump Start
climbs.fa: Pat Brennan, Jeff Brennan and Will Carlson, June 2001

content.description: Climbs a clean left-facing corner on a yellow and black streaked face.
content.location:
Not actually on Rock Craft proper but just across the gully from

Smelly Bush Crack

and below

White Rabbit

.

climbs.name: Gobi Crack
climbs.fa: Jeff Brennan, Pat Brennan and Kenn Kenaga, July 2001

content.description: Wiggle up the wide crack to a left-leaning hand crack that jogs back right and then finish up a short crack on the wall behind to top out.
content.location:
Starts down and left from

"B" Crack

.

climbs.name: Bread, Live in Concert
climbs.fa: Brad Singer, Dave LePere, Steve Kravchuck and Jeff Brennan, July 2001

content.description: Thin face moves gain the security of a thin to hand crack higher.
content.location: Located in the middle of the right-side routes.

climbs.name: "B" Crack
climbs.fa: Pat Brennan, Jeff Brennan and Brad Singer, July 2001

content.description: Climb a short thin crack, clip a bolt to protect moves into the crack above and mantle onto a ledge; continue up the crack above until a bolt protects face moves to the top.
content.location:
Just left of

Bread, Live in Concert

and behind a small pine tree.
